text: Bolinichthyes is an extinct genus of prehistoric ray-finned fish. == Description == It may have resembled the present day lanternfish. == Species == This genus has only one species: * Bolinichthyes longipes (type) == Classification == Bolinicthyes Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Chordata Class: Actinopterygii Order: Myctophiformes Genus: Bolinichthyes Species: B. longipes == Related pages == * Evolution of fish * List of prehistoric bony fish == References == # Drazen, Jeffrey C.; De Forest, Lisa G.; Domokos, Reka (2011-05-01). "Micronekton abundance and biomass in Hawaiian waters as influenced by seamounts, eddies, and the moon". Deep Sea Research Part I: Oceanographic Research Papers. 58 (5): 557â€“566. Bibcode:2011DSRI...58..557D. doi:10.1016/j.dsr.2011.03.002. ISSN 0967-0637. Taxon identifiers * Wikidata: Q4939471 * GBIF: 4837275 * IRMNG: 1035292 Category:Extinct fish Category:Ray- finned fish
title: Bolinichthyes
